concept.title: 203.502-2 Subcontractor kickbacks.

conbody.p: (h) The DoD Inspector General has designated Special Agents of the following investigative organizations as representatives for conducting inspections and audits under 41 U.S.C. chapter 87, Kickbacks:
(iii) Air Force Office of Special Investigations.
